mapper.select: select t.plandetailid,t.planname from b_planfile_inplan t left join b_planfile_detail bpd on bpd.plandetailid=t.plandetailid where 1=1 and bpd.grainid=#{grainid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
select t.storageid "storageid", t.storagename "storagename", t.defgrainid "defgrainid" from l_storage t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
select t.contractid "contractid", t.contractno "contractno" from b_contract t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.grainid=#{grainid}
